item.description:
Michael?s Men?s Night Presented By Porsche

Men?s Night promises to be a much-needed break for its all male guests, on Febuary 12th, 2008.

We invite guests to a preview of "hot" 2008 models from the luxury auto brand Porsche. The event will also feature a lingerie fashion show by Night And Day of Newburyport.


This fashion auto show also includes a hassle-free environment for male customers at Michael's to purchase Valentine?s Day gifts. The event will feature personal shoppers to assist the male attendees with their purchase decisions.


We Look forward to see you there,
Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup badge.
item.why: There will be "Hot" Cars and a Lingerie fashion Show
item.name: Michael's Harborside Mens Night With Porsche
